long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make as many matches as you can in this fun Christmas themed match 3 game. This game features beautiful graphics and addictive game play. Play Christmas Match 3 while you wait for the big day to arrive!
